enhanced_by.reason: The attr method sets or gets attributes, which can influence the presence of an attribute checked by hasAttr.
The removeAttr method removes attributes, which can affect the presence of an attribute checked by hasAttr.
The attr method retrieves the attribute value, which can be used to assert the presence and value of attributes checked by hasAttr.
The eachAttr method retrieves all attribute values, which can be used to assert the presence and values of multiple attributes checked by hasAttr.
